text: Kasone, ki kufr varzidand, megūjand: «Qijomat hargiz ʙa suroƣi mo naxohad omad». Bigū: «Ore, savgand ʙa Parvardigoram, ki donoi ƣajʙ ast, hatman, ʙa suroƣaton meojad. hamsangi zarrae dar osmonho va zamin az Ū pūşida nest va kucaktar va ʙuzurgtar az on zarra cize nest, magar on ki dar kitoʙe oşkor [Lavhi mahfuz] saʙt ast
